name: SmallRobots
title: Small Robots - Just make the two robots a little smaller.
author: DellAquila, Kryzeth, Pi-C
description: Logistic Robot and Construction Robots are 50% smaller (scale is configurable). This mod works with all modded robots. It's recommended to use this mod together with "minime - More accurate player size compared to vehicles". Now with special settings for "Atomic Robots"!
